<td width="5%" align="left" valign="top"> <table width="132" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="greypicbox" summary="extra information table">
The quality and commitment of our staff, our continuing investment in resources, our career-focused courses and our friendly atmosphere all combine to make Trinity &
column2: All Saints a very special place to study.

column1: Our continually high level of student satisfaction and our impressive employment rate are just two indicators of our success, and we work hard to ensure that the best resources, services and support are available to all our students.

Located on an attractive campus close to Leeds, the UK's fastest growing city, we are ideally placed to offer you the very beat learning experience. We look forward to helping maximise your knowledge, skills and employment prospects.
